page.title: 05The Camp.
page.content: At The Camp there is a small settlement which until recent years boasted a post office,with stores,and a pub.Many of the residents are retired or work outside the area but there ara several farms and businesses-among them being a dealer in vintage cars and motorbikes and a riding stables. The dealer sells a lot of spare parts abroad,especially to Japan.He finds that the isolated position is not a handicap because of the specialist nature of his work. The riding stables are well placed to offer some very attractive and varied riding.There are at present 36 horses and the stables provide riding lessons as well as day rides and week-long pony treks (for details ring Miserden 219).
